message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in making a deal, but I need to be within my budget.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $11,500?
